Message.Jp: 遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
There have been reports of damage believed to be 
caused by violent creatures in 
<NAME AREA>, 
although the information is uncertain.
Message.Jp:
不確実な情報だが、<NAME AREA>から
狂暴な魔物のしわざと思われる被害報告があった

Message.En:
Since that day, there hasn't been a single night I could sleep.
Is it just a simple robbery, or perhaps the work of a man-eating demon?
All the cute and lovely cows and pigs in my place,
they all disappeared somewhere.
With fear and frustration, my hands keep trembling nonstop.
I'll give away all of my possessions, someone please make this trembling stop.
Message.Jp:
あの日から、眠れた夜などありはしねえ
ただの追剥なのか、はては人喰い鬼の仕業なのか
俺んとこの可愛いくて愛くるしい、牛もブタも
みんなどこかに消えちまった
恐怖と悔しさで、ずっと手の震えが止まらねえ
俺の財産全てやる、誰かこの震えを止めてくれ
遭遇した敵を討伐する
